newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Acres Gaming rated buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Acres Gaming rated buy.

text.p: -- Ladenburg Thalmann said its analyst Andrew Zarnett has started coverage of Acres Gaming Inc, a maker of casino management and slot merchandising products, with a buy rating.

-- In a statement, Zarnett called this technology "of prime importance for slot managers." He said a recent alliance with slot machine equipment maker International Game Technology Inc could result in the retrofit of as many as 100,000 gambling machines with the technology.
-- Zarnett said he expects the collaboration to spur revenue growth by about 40 percent and cash flow growth by some 60 percent in the foreseeable future.
